sentences.sentence: The value of China increase with steady steps between 2010 and 2015; while Japan decrease with steady steps between 2010 and 2015.
The sum value of Japan and China has an unusual drop in 2014.
There is an unusual drop in 2014 of Japan and China.
The sum value of Japan and China keep stable between 2010 and 2013, then it decrease greatly by 2014, then it increase by 2015.
